ProductInfo.Features:
Smart hub apps enhance your monitor experience / Wirelessly connect and share on more screens
Hassle-free wireless access for your devices / Enhance viewing from mobile to monitor
Wirelessly access and stream your content / Expand your experience with various inputs
Choose a well-connected monitor to expand your home entertainment experience. The Samsung Series 7 HDTV monitor features new WiDi (Wireless Display) technology that allows compatible devices nearby to share movies, music, photos and more. You can enjoy all your favourite content on a bigger and better screen. With direct connection to Smart Hub and a wireless LAN adaptor, you'll also access apps, content and online social networks. Take your entertainment experience to the next level on a bigger screen with innovative new features.
In Korea, we use 220 Voltage and Type C plug. Some products has a adapter and in that case, they support Free Voltage and Type C plug. * Shipping from Korea, South. * Delivery time is 4~5 working days *Expedited shipping by FedEX or EMS *Exclude Shipping country American Samoa, Marshall Islands, Virgin Islands (U.S.), Andorra, Guernsey, Faroe Islands, Georgia, Greenland, Iceland, Isle Of Man, Jan Mayen Is, Jersey, Kosovo, Lithuania, Malta, Montenegro, Serbia, Svalbard, Christmas Island, Cook Islands, East Timor, Fiji, French Polynesia, Nauru, New Caledonia, Papua New Guinea, Niue, Samoa, Solomon Islands, Tonga, Vanuatu, Tuvalu, Argentina, Brazil, Costa Rica.
